name: HartBurn
description:
HartBurn! <3

Was once a huge project my friend and I planned to complete, but i slowly lost passion for it and so did my friend. Dont worry tho im not gonna stop making games completely!

This is my first project ive made with game maker, and because of that it became increasingly difficult to work with it.

HartBurn is a fast paced platformer that pushes you to finish levels in a set amount of seconds. 

To start grab the key and bring it to the lock!
